00057 using System;
00058 using System.Collections.Generic;
00059 
00060 namespace MathNet.Numerics.Interpolation.Algorithms
00061 {
00068     public class SplineInterpolation :
00069         IInterpolationMethod
00070     {
00071         IList<double> _t;
00072         IList<double> _c;
00073         int _n;
00074 
00078         public
00079         SplineInterpolation()
00080         {
00081         }
00082 
00087         public bool SupportsDifferentiation
00088         {
00089             get { return true; }
00090         }
00091 
00096         public bool SupportsIntegration
00097         {
00098             get { return true; }
00099         }
00100 
00106         public
00107         void
00108         Init(
00109             IList<double> t,
00110             IList<double> c
00111             )
00112         {
00113             if(null == t)
00114             {
00115                 throw new ArgumentNullException("t");
00116             }
00117 
00118             if(null == c)
00119             {
00120                 throw new ArgumentNullException("c");
00121             }
00122 
00123             if(t.Count < 1)
00124             {
00125                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("t");
00126             }
00127 
00128             if(c.Count != 4 * (t.Count - 1))
00129             {
00130                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("c");
00131             }
00132 
00133             _t = t;
00134             _c = c;
00135             _n = t.Count;
00136         }
00137 
00143         public
00144         double
00145         Interpolate(
00146             double t
00147             )
00148         {
00149             // Binary search in the [ t[0], ..., t[n-2] ] (t[n-1] is not included)
00150             int low = 0;
00151             int high = _n - 1;
00152             while(low != high - 1)
00153             {
00154                 int middle = (low + high) / 2;
00155                 if(_t[middle] > t)
00156                 {
00157                     high = middle;
00158                 }
00159                 else
00160                 {
00161                     low = middle;
00162                 }
00163             }
00164 
00165             // Interpolation
00166             t = t - _t[low];
00167             int k = low << 2;
00168             return _c[k] + t * (_c[k + 1] + t * (_c[k + 2] + t * _c[k + 3]));
00169         }
00170 
00178         public
00179         double
00180         Differentiate(
00181             double t,
00182             out double first,
00183             out double second
00184             )
00185         {
00186             // Binary search in the [ t[0], ..., t[n-2] ] (t[n-1] is not included)
00187             int low = 0;
00188             int high = _n - 1;
00189             while(low != high - 1)
00190             {
00191                 int middle = (low + high) / 2;
00192                 if(_t[middle] > t)
00193                 {
00194                     high = middle;
00195                 }
00196                 else
00197                 {
00198                     low = middle;
00199                 }
00200             }
00201 
00202             // Differentiation
00203             t = t - _t[low];
00204             int k = low << 2;
00205             first = _c[k + 1] + 2 * t * _c[k + 2] + 3 * t * t * _c[k + 3];
00206             second = 2 * _c[k + 2] + 6 * t * _c[k + 3];
00207             return _c[k] + t * (_c[k + 1] + t * (_c[k + 2] + t * _c[k + 3]));
00208         }
00209 
00216         public
00217         double
00218         Integrate(
00219             double t
00220             )
00221         {
00222             // Binary search in the [ t[0], ..., t[n-2] ] (t[n-1] is not included)
00223             int low = 0;
00224             int high = _n - 1;
00225             while(low != high - 1)
00226             {
00227                 int middle = (low + high) / 2;
00228                 if(_t[middle] > t)
00229                 {
00230                     high = middle;
00231                 }
00232                 else
00233                 {
00234                     low = middle;
00235                 }
00236             }
00237 
00238             // Integration
00239             double result = 0;
00240             for(int i = 0, j = 0; i < low; i++, j += 4)
00241             {
00242                 double w = _t[i + 1] - _t[i];
00243                 result += w * (_c[j] + w * (_c[j + 1] * 0.5 + w * (_c[j + 2] / 3 + w * _c[j + 3] * 0.25)));
00244             }
00245 
00246             t = t - _t[low];
00247             int k = low << 2;
00248             return result + t * (_c[k] + t * (_c[k + 1] * 0.5 + t * (_c[k + 2] / 3 + t * _c[k + 3] * 0.25)));
00249         }
00250     }
00251 }
